title: Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Based on Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and comprehension at the secondary education level
context.additional_context: Ensuring accessibility through optimization of smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain math problem-solving methods using real-time video conferencing tools (e.g., Zoom) in ERT (Emergency Remote Teaching) environments.
Learners achieve over 80% mastery in weekly formative assessments using smartphone-based apps.
Learners establish self-directed learning strategies to enhance mathematical thinking through peer feedback systems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
